Title: SGB (SDL2 Graphical Bootstrapper)
Description: An auxiliary C++ library for SDL2 that manages window initialization and screen transitions, with multi-threading for loading assets.

Title: MatchRetweeter
Description: A X/Twitter bot made in Python, running on AWS Lambda, DynamoDB and CloudWatch services, with the purpose of sharing online fighting game tournament announcements and registrations.
* Sadly inactive as of May 22, 2023 due to changes in X/Twitter API billing plans.

Title: MaSV (MIDI and Soundfont Visualizer)
Description: A study on the MIDI file format, while also remixing sequences using different soundfont (.sf2) files.
Made in C++ with the SGB library as base.
The above video uses a soundfont that tries to imitate the YM2608 sound chip found in later PC-9801 computer models.

Title: This site
Description: Made with Blazor WebAssembly and hosted in GitHub pages structure.
It loads those item lists from JSON files while using a component-based building framework.
The highlighted terms in bold are also loaded from a list.
